lead_paragraph: GLASSMAN--Paul, of Cliffside Park, Founder of Ropal Stationery NYC, beloved husband of Roslyn, father of Reed and Nancy Glassman, Leslie Glassman. Grandfather of Anna and Allison Glassman. For info "Eden Memorial Chapels," Fort Lee, (201) 947-3336. 1/3
